text: Ne omukabo kwenyu ni inusu khushabakhasi benyu baleshele nikali mbu babula Omwana. Ne nibali nende Omwana awo omukabo kwenyu ni irobo khushia baleshele, nibakhamala okhurusiamwo shiayalaka nohomba likofi. Ne Abakhasi benyu balanyoola irobo khushiamuleshele nimulali nende Omwana tawe. Ne nimuli nende Omwana betsa okhunyoola itsumuni khushiamuleshele, nibakhamala okhurusiamo shiayalaka nohomba likofi. Ne nikali mbu Omusatsanohomba Omukhasi uchelamungwa abula Omwana nohomba abebusi, ne ali nende Omwana wabu weshisatsa noho weshikhasi, awo buli shiamulala alanyoola isudusi. Ne nibali abanjii okhushila awo betsa okhukabana ithuluthi, nibakharusiamwo akayalaka nohomba likofi, obularera okhumisia tawe, kano ni amachelo karula khu Nyasaye. Ne Nyasaye ni Omumanyi Omwihotselefu muno
